data.name: Otherland: Next - Basic Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
The OTHERLAND: Next BASIC STARTER PACK provides a valuable boost to jumpstart and enhance your OTHERLAND: Next experience with faster EXP gain, more inventory space, currencies to spend on cool in-game items and more options to customize your character!

The pack contains the following items:

  • 500 Credits (premium currency)
  • 1000 Bits (in-game currency)
  • 200% XP Enhancer
  • Inventory Expander for 6 inventory slots
  • Advanced MetaMorph Voucher (enhanced character customization)
data.about_the_game:
The OTHERLAND: Next BASIC STARTER PACK provides a valuable boost to jumpstart and enhance your OTHERLAND: Next experience with faster EXP gain, more inventory space, currencies to spend on cool in-game items and more options to customize your character!

The pack contains the following items:

  • 500 Credits (premium currency)
  • 1000 Bits (in-game currency)
  • 200% XP Enhancer
  • Inventory Expander for 6 inventory slots
  • Advanced MetaMorph Voucher (enhanced character customization)
data.short_description: THIS STARTER PACK DLC provides a selection of useful and valuable items and currency to jumpstart your OTHERLAND experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio
  • Additional Notes: Otherland does not support connection over VPN if split tunnelling is disabled and does not support IPv6 connections.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio
  • Additional Notes: Otherland does not support connection over VPN if split tunnelling is disabled and does not support IPv6 connections.
